segments.text: I keep looking back at the woman by the sink; it's astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, completely unfazed by anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a substantial puddle around her feet, and she simply stands in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, as if this is perfectly normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little angry that she's so disconnected from her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are practically committing grand theft cookie right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kitchen is slowly turning into an indoor swimming pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her serene focus on that plate is almost admirable, yet so frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness is truly something to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down, make her notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so calm amidst such unfolding chaos?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she exists in her own quiet, dry bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR
